title: Spoilt for choice: How changing consumer preferences & tech advancements driving upgrades in electronics and car
description: Hyundai Motor India introduced the third upgrade to its flagship SUV, Creta, in January, followed by the performance-focused Creta N Line variant in March. Samsung launched the Galaxy S24 Ultra smartphone in yellow color. Kia India's senior VP highlighted the reduced product life cycles in the automotive industry.
